docs.abstract: The Sports Bra in Portland, Ore., is a rarity dedicated exclusively to women’s sports. The latest highlight was the N.C.A.A. women’s basketball final.
docs.snippet: The Sports Bra in Portland, Ore., is a rarity dedicated exclusively to women’s sports. The latest highlight was the N.C.A.A. women’s basketball final.

headline.main: Fans of Women’s Sports Walk Into a Bar Inspired by Women’s Sports
headline.print_headline: A Seat at the Bar Without All the Mansplaining

docs.abstract: The justices issued a temporary order allowing the girl to compete on the girls’ track team at a West Virginia middle school.
docs.snippet: The justices issued a temporary order allowing the girl to compete on the girls’ track team at a West Virginia middle school.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — The Supreme Court ruled on Thursday that a transgender girl may compete on the girls’ cross country and track teams at her middle school in West Virginia while her appeal moved forward, signaling that a majority of the justices are not ready to enter another battleground in the culture wars.

headline.main: Supreme Court Rules for Transgender Girl in School Sports Dispute
headline.print_headline: Justices Rule in Favor Of Transgender Runner

docs.abstract: It is the first time the administration has substantively weighed in on the charged debate. The proposal would also prevent schools from enacting across-the-board bans.
docs.snippet: It is the first time the administration has substantively weighed in on the charged debate. The proposal would also prevent schools from enacting across-the-board bans.
docs.lead_paragraph: The Biden administration proposed a rule change on Thursday that would allow schools to block some transgender athletes from competing on sports teams that match their gender identities. But the proposal would also prevent schools from enacting across-the-board bans.

headline.main: Biden Plan Allows Limits on Trans Athletes’ Participation in School Sports
headline.print_headline: Trans Athletes Facing Limits In Biden Plan

byline.original: By Sarah Mervosh, Remy Tumin and Ava Sasani

docs.abstract: The Buffalo Bills safety, who went into cardiac arrest during an N.F.L. game in January, is “in a great head space to come back and make his return,” according to the team’s general manager.
docs.snippet: The Buffalo Bills safety, who went into cardiac arrest during an N.F.L. game in January, is “in a great head space to come back and make his return,” according to the team’s general manager.
docs.lead_paragraph: Damar Hamlin, the Buffalo Bills safety whose heart stopped during a prime time game in January, has been cleared to return to football activities, Bills General Manager Brandon Beane announced Tuesday.

headline.main: Damar Hamlin Is Cleared to Return to Football
headline.print_headline: Bills’ Hamlin Is Cleared To Return To Football

docs.abstract: Max Scherzer was ejected from Wednesday’s win over the Los Angeles Dodgers because of a foreign substance, providing yet another speed bump for the Mets’ starting rotation.
docs.snippet: Max Scherzer was ejected from Wednesday’s win over the Los Angeles Dodgers because of a foreign substance, providing yet another speed bump for the Mets’ starting rotation.
docs.lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES — Starting pitchers for 200. It was not a Jeopardy question at Dodger Stadium this week. It was a prelude-to-Cooperstown and anticipating-the-stretch-run kind of number.

headline.main: Mets Aces Battle With Batters, Umpires, Injuries and Time
headline.print_headline: Mets Pitchers Battle Time. And Then the Umpires Weigh In.

docs.abstract: Bridges pleaded no contest to felony domestic violence in November. He was accused of assaulting the mother of his children.
docs.snippet: Bridges pleaded no contest to felony domestic violence in November. He was accused of assaulting the mother of his children.
docs.lead_paragraph: Miles Bridges, the N.B.A. forward who pleaded no contest to felony domestic violence in the fall, has been suspended for 30 games, the league announced on Friday. Bridges, 25, had played for the Charlotte Hornets for four seasons before he was accused of assaulting his girlfriend in front of their children last June. He was not under contract during the 2022-23 regular season and did not appear in any games.

headline.main: N.B.A. Suspends Miles Bridges for 30 Games for Domestic Violence
headline.print_headline: Hornets Player Is Suspended  After Domestic Violence Plea

docs.abstract: In a memo, the league said it was “facing a very different economic reality than just one year ago.”
docs.snippet: In a memo, the league said it was “facing a very different economic reality than just one year ago.”
docs.lead_paragraph: The N.B.A., citing “economic headwinds,” instructed league office staff on Tuesday to reduce expenses and significantly limit hiring for the rest of the fiscal year, according to a memo obtained by The New York Times.

headline.main: N.B.A. Blames Economy for Hiring Freeze and Budget Cuts
headline.print_headline: N.B.A. Cites Economy for Hiring Freeze and Cutbacks

docs.abstract: The success of Air Raid offenses, changes to college football rules and athletic defenses will impact the players selected when the draft begins April 27.
docs.snippet: The success of Air Raid offenses, changes to college football rules and athletic defenses will impact the players selected when the draft begins April 27.
docs.lead_paragraph: Fans will see some unfamiliar sights in the early rounds of the 2023 N.F.L. draft. From middle-schooler size receivers to tight ends built like comic book supervillains to prospects already halfway to earning their AARP cards, this year’s draft class reflects a tipping point in on-field strategies and N.F.L. priorities, as well as the rules that govern how the N.C.A.A. does business.

headline.main: N.F.L. Draft 2023: The Trends That Will Shake Up the Top Picks
headline.print_headline: Ahead of the Draft, A Few Things Are Already Obvious

docs.abstract: Baffert was barred from Triple Crown races after Medina Spirit tested positive for a prohibited drug at the 2021 Kentucky Derby. But owners keep sending him expensive horses — and he keeps winning.
docs.snippet: Baffert was barred from Triple Crown races after Medina Spirit tested positive for a prohibited drug at the 2021 Kentucky Derby. But owners keep sending him expensive horses — and he keeps winning.
docs.lead_paragraph: ARCADIA, Calif.— As exiles go, Bob Baffert’s has been a comfortable one. Most mornings, the horse trainer who is barred from competing in the Kentucky Derby, can be found beneath the rouge-tipped San Gabriel Mountains, holding court at Clockers’ Corner, the open-air bistro at Santa Anita Park.

headline.main: Even in Exile, Bob Baffert Is the King of the Sport of Kings
headline.print_headline: Even in Exile, Baffert Remains King Of the Sport Of Kings

docs.abstract: Ahead of the W.N.B.A. draft, women’s basketball remains troubled by racial disparities in how its stars are showcased.
docs.snippet: Ahead of the W.N.B.A. draft, women’s basketball remains troubled by racial disparities in how its stars are showcased.
docs.lead_paragraph: Aliyah Boston, one of the most dominant and decorated players in women’s college basketball, was selected with the top pick in the W.N.B.A. draft Monday night.

headline.main: A Growing W.N.B.A. Still Boxes Out Some Personalities
headline.print_headline: W.N.B.A. Puts On An Unsettling Face
